[b][color=white]Adult Zone Accounts[/color][/b]
Finally, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has created an Adult Zone Forum. Members can Buy/Sell adult accounts but posting adult images, and adult links still aren't allowed. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5978941]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Discord Policy[/color][/b]
Now users can only post their username and can't promote their Channels. As using Discord for transactions can drive to a scam. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5978942]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HF Editor Theme[/color][/b]
Go poll for which theme would you prefer for the text editor. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5979808]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]2nd color choice Mobale theme[/color][/b] *see below for latest update*
Go ahead and vote for your favourite color for the Mobale theme. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5981341]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Mobale Theme[/color][/b]
We now have a new default Mobale theme color. Mobale Purple is only for upgraded members now. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5983303]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Blackhat Section[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has created a new Blackhat Training Section to improve member's Internet and Computer Security knowledge. Kindly read the section policy for disallowed Blackhat activities. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5981321]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1651695][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5981321][color=#FFFFFF]Someone Turn off the Lights?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient has released a new section called Blackhat Training. The section is experimental and could still be removed.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5981341][color=#FFFFFF]Mobale Color Choice[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient is considering a second choice for the mabale color theme we currently have here on the forum. He wants to know what you would think is a good color if a new theme color was added.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5978475][color=#FFFFFF]Social Media Login[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient has created a poll asking if a social media login was implemented, would you use it?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5978941][color=#FFFFFF]News Adult Zone Accounts[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
After a very long time, Omniscient has finally added a new section to Hack Forums. The "Adult Zone" was highly requested for years, and it has finally happened. You can sell Adult accounts, But there are strict rules on it so make sure you have a read of the thread.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5982018][color=#FFFFFF]VLC is now vulnerable[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1297408][color=#FFFFFF][b]Giselle[/b][/color][/url]
VLC media player has been found to be vulnerable. Do you use it? If so make sure you are on the latest version otherwise you could risk your security.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5977912][color=#FFFFFF]5 Years of Hack Forums[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][color=#FFFFFF][b]Mix[/b][/color][/url]
The member Mix has made a thread about his first five years here at Hack Forums and shouted out many different members who he deems an effect on his time here so far.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5979808][color=#FFFFFF]HF Editor Color[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#9999FF][b]Xerotic[/b][/color][/url]
Xerotic has shown up a sneak peek of the new text editor that he has been working on and has made two designs, One is a light design and the other is a dark theme. Go & have your say.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5978942][color=#FFFFFF]Discord Policy[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
After a very large number of requests over a long period of time Omniscient has changed the policy and ruling around the whole discord matter. You are now allowed to share your discord ID.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5978550][color=#FFFFFF]Riot.IM[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient Wants to know if you know what Riot.IM, If you do he has linked a group on there for everyone to join, He talks about possibly integrating it on site, but this is not confirmed.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5982109][color=#FFFFFF]Unicorn Changed the Way I Poop![/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][color=#99CCFF][b]Eagle 95[/b][/color][/url]
Eagle has made everyone question how we poop, he has made a very good point in this thread but is he right or is he wrong?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5981781][color=#FFFFFF]What do you think the odds of becoming a millionaire as a teenager?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3498413][color=#0066FF][b]DrSpicyHot[/b][/color][/url]
DrSpicyHot has asked everyone if becoming a millionaire in this day and age at the age of a teen is even possible and if the odds are in favour to be possible.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5979576][color=#FFFFFF]Trolling Social Media[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Trolling is something we all love to do once in a while, Omniscient has admitted he is in the mood to do some trolling, but is scared that he will get his accounts deleted.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5978855][color=#FFFFFF]How much DATA do you use a month[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3446221][color=#EC7E03][b]Banter.[/b][/color][/url]
Banter. made a thread about how much data a month he uses and it's over 300 GBS, crazy right, there are many more members in this thread sharing there's and its a great discussion in there.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5980039][color=#FFFFFF][Samaritans Project] Just, my humble opinion [Samaritans Project][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3604010][color=#ED1C24][b]secretachiever101[/b][/color][/url]
secretachiever101 has released a thread that he did as a project for Samaritans, It talks about who he is and not giving up on yourself or your dreams, Believe in yourself.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5979928][color=#FFFFFF]First Giveaway!! [$10 BTC][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2790676][color=#0066FF][b]lavender.[/b][/color][/url]
lavender. has started his first ever giveaway giving away ten dollars bitcoin, the giveaway ends on the first of July so make sure you enter to have a chance to win.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5979379][color=#FFFFFF][GOONS CARTEL] 4X DIAMOND OF HELL AWARDS.[SECRETACHIEVER+KILL JOY][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3604010][color=#ED1C24][b]secretachiever101[/b][/color][/url]
The crew The Goons are hosting a giveaway with four diamond of hell awards to give to four lucky members, Make sure you go and thank Kill Joy and Secretachiever101.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2991200][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/gamingnews-crescent.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Halo Infinite Is Still Coming To Xbox One[/color][/b]
Microsoft's E3 2019 press conference has announced a lot of new things, One of these is the existence of the previously rumored Xbox Scarlett console. Microsoft also showed off a new trailer for Halo Infinite and confirmed the game would come to Xbox Scarlett in Christmas 2020. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/e3-2019-halo-infinite-still-coming-to-xbox-one-mic/1100-6467604/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cyberpunk 2077 Release Date Has Been Announced[/color][/b]
CD Projekt Red released a new Cyberpunk 2077 trailer at the Xbox E3 2019. While this is usually a thing that they would do, they had John Wick star Keanu Reeves come on stage and announce it, and the internet is going crazy. Trending on Twitter and Instagram, The John Wick star broke the internet. Cyberpunk 2077 is scheduled to release on April 16, 2020.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamesradar.com/cyberpunk-2077-release-date-keanu-reeves/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Marvel's Avengers Game Will Have Microtransactions[/color][/b]
Marvel's Avengers, the new game being developed by Square Enix will have micro-transactions announces  Crystal Dynamics lead Shaun Escayg.He said, "There will be custom outfits that you can purchase in microtransactions." The game, however, thankfully will not have loot boxes or pay-to-win mechanics, Crystal Dynamics confirmed during the Square Enix E3 2019 briefing. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/marvels-avengers-game-has-microtransactions-e3-201/1100-6467797/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: Hack Forums News // Edition 438
